complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the project initialization into: creating the Next.js project, configuring Tailwind CSS, setting up project structure and folders, configuring development tools (ESLint/Prettier), and setting up Git repository with Vercel deployment.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving multiple setup steps and configuration of different tools, but well-documented processes with clear outcomes.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: creating the global layout component structure, implementing the responsive header with logo and navigation, building the sticky footer component, and ensuring responsive navigation behavior across devices.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Standard frontend task with responsive design considerations. Requires careful planning for mobile navigation but uses common patterns.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into: building the hero section layout and content, implementing the call-to-action buttons with proper routing, and adding the fade-in animation effects.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Straightforward page development with basic animation. Well-defined requirements with clear visual outcomes.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: creating the bio section layout, building the interactive timeline component, implementing the résumé download functionality, and ensuring responsive design across devices.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity due to the timeline component requiring custom design and the need to handle PDF downloads properly.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: creating the project gallery grid layout, building individual project cards with video thumbnails, developing the reusable project detail page template, implementing responsive video embeds with autoplay, and creating the navigation between gallery and detail pages.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving dynamic routing, video handling, reusable components, and multiple interconnected pages with specific technical requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into: designing and implementing the skills visualization component (grid/bar format), creating the experience timeline or list section, and ensuring the page supports scroll depth tracking analytics.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate task focused on data presentation with some visual components, but relatively straightforward implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: building the contact form UI with validation, creating the Vercel serverless function, integrating SendGrid email service, implementing reCAPTCHA v3 spam protection, adding form submission feedback states, and testing email delivery functionality.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving frontend, backend, third-party integrations, security considerations, and multiple failure points that need proper handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: gathering and populating final content across all pages, implementing page-specific SEO metadata and titles, configuring Open Graph tags for social sharing, and setting up video thumbnails for project sharing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity requiring attention to detail across multiple pages and technical SEO implementation, but mostly configuration-based work.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: conducting automated accessibility audits and fixing issues, implementing proper semantic HTML and ARIA labels, testing and ensuring keyboard navigation functionality, verifying color contrast ratios meet WCAG standards, and comprehensive responsive testing across device sizes.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity requiring systematic testing, knowledge of accessibility standards, and potentially significant remediation work across the entire application.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into: optimizing images and implementing lazy loading, setting up and configuring analytics tracking, running performance audits and implementing optimizations, configuring production domain and DNS settings, deploying to production with HTTPS, and conducting final performance validation testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving performance optimization, analytics setup, production deployment, and meeting specific performance targets with multiple technical considerations.
